body.name: TracFone Motorola Moto g Pure, 32GB, Blue - Prepaid Smartphone (Locked)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 15 hrs 7 mins
features: 6.5 inches Max Vision HD+ display and MediaTek Helio G25 processor.
4000 mAh battery that lasts up to 2 days. Water-repellent design.
Compatible with no-contract talk & text plans from Tracfone starting at $15/mo.
body.description: Get a smartphone that does it all with the moto g Pure from Tracfone. Equipped with an octa-core processor with HyperEngine, the Moto G Pure is notable for its super-responsive performance that reacts instantly to every touch, tap, and swipe. This, paired with its ultra-wide Max vision HD+ display, make it the perfect smartphone for playing games, streaming movies, video chatting and more. Made with accidents in mind, the moto g Pure is water-repellent so you can worry less about splashes, spills and light rain. Capture stunning portraits with the 13MP Dual Camera System – regardless of the time of day – with its Night Vision feature. Plus, keep the fun going all weekend long with two-day battery. Pair this device with a premium wireless experience without the premium price tag or costly long-term contracts – get Unlimited talk & text plans from Tracfone that start at just $15/mo for a single line. Enjoy special perks like hotspot capability, international long distance calling, and exclusive discounts. Shop for the moto g Pure and your next Tracfone plan online today.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently Asked Questions Q: Does this phone come with a SIM Card or do I need to purchase an additional SIM Card to Activate? A: This phone does come with a SIM Card that is ready to activate. You do not need to buy a separate SIM card. Q: Where can I buy a service plan or airtime for this phone? A: Service plans and airtime cards are available at Amazon.com. Q: How do I activate service on my new device? A: You can activate on the Tracfone website. Have your new phone’s IMEI/MEID/Serial # and a service plan PIN ready and follow the step-by-step instructions on the red card that comes with your device. Q: Is this phone unlocked? A: No, this phone is locked to the Tracfone network and can only be activated with a compatible Tracfone service plan. Q: Can I use this phone outside of the US? A: This phone cannot be used outside of the United States unless you are using a Tracfone Wireless plan that includes international roaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value. Works w Walmart Family Mobile SIM as TracFone bought WFM in 2016 & Runs on T-Mobile
reviews.reviewText: Amazing phone for the moneyLenovo has done a fantastic job since it acquired Motorola.Like my prior Motorola fones, this one has minimal bloatware for a near stock Android experience.Just a few easy to remove pre-installed games, and easy to remove Facebook app as well.FM radio app can't be removed, but it was easy to deactivate.Note:This fone will not work with a T-Mobile SIM, it requires a TracFone SIM.Even though TracFone does use in fact use T-Mobile towers, amongst others.Does work perfectly with my Walmart Family Mobile SIM card (running T-Mobile), as WFM is 100% owned by TracFone.Therefore, my WFM SIM is actually a Tracfone SIM card, connecting to the T-Mobile network.No tweaks during set up were needed, such as modifying the Access Point Name (APN).Put my SIM in, powered up, and followed prompts during set up.Even better, wirelessly copied all settings and apps from my old fone.Followed prompts on both fones, to both grant and accept permission to copy.With 55 apps, took about 1 hour, but a very easy and automated process.Only "downside" of fone is large size, which is a plus for many.But, I'm quickly getting used to moving from a 5.5 inch phone, to this 6.5 inch.Also, greatly appreciate moving from a 16GB phone to this 32GB.Being able to keep as many Apps as one likes, and without needing to clear cache weekly to free up space for existing apps, is a huge upgrade, and big convivence.Yes, Apps can stored on an SD, but it's already near full of music, movies, and photos.I'm not a "gamer" so the 3GB of RAM works perfectly.No lags even when multi-tasking, etc.My only multi-tasking is listening to music via streaming or via an app from SD stored music, while a fitness tracker in running.Worked fine with prior Moto e6 2GB RAM fone, and still no problem with this 3GB RAM fone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have never used a “pay as you go” plan and never had an android phone before. This is intended as a temporary phone but I’m quite pleased all the way around with the tracphone Easy to reload minutes and data and the phone holds a charge for a long time. So far have been very pleased with the quality and ease of use and would recommend for an inexpensive choice for phone usage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Way bigger and nicer than my old phone! Great buy for the price!
reviews.reviewText: So, I wanted something that was a bit bigger than my old android device but stick with Tracfone too because their network/service works well for me at this moment in time. So, I was pleased to find this phone and I have never had any issues with Motorola in the last so winning on that too. The phone is really nice! One benefit that I love is that the battery life is awesome. Overall, I am pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Phone, for LOW price!
reviews.reviewText: Overall basic phone but has a lot of capabilities. Great price on a great network.I purchased this phone to replace my husband BLU two tracfone which was literally a piece of trash just because the slowness, etc.This phone has a noticeable fast response on the screen etc. it holds a charge for a good time. It is a fairly large phone I suggest a case because I can see how it would be easily breakable. The screen is large and bright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid phone with great screen
reviews.reviewText: This phone is solid, nice feel, good weight, attractive in looks and easy to use. For it's price, it is a great phone. Even though my previous phone still works great, it is 16 GB and I was running out of memory for apps. I had to start removing apps as with each update of each app, they seemed to bloat taking up more and more memory. That led me to needing a new phone with 32 GB of memory which led me to this phone. Previously I always used LG Tracfones but I read LG is no longer making inexpensive Tracfones which is probably why they are no longer on Tracfone's website. I always wondered how the Motorola phones were so when I saw this at a great price I bought it. I have not connected it to Tracfone service yet as I want to have it setup to my liking before I do. Even though it is still Android there are some differences with the Moto settings and its use of the features that make me prefer the LG phones but nothing that would make me not like it or want to use it. My only complaint is no where on the Amazon listing for this phone did it say whether it is GSM or CDMA so I don't know whether Tracfone in my area will accept this phone. The packing list said CDMA but according to Motorola's website it is GSM. Then I read that Tracfone was bought by Verizon and as of November 2023 Tracfone plans will be changed. There is some confusion whether Verizon is still CDMA or not. So I don't know whether I will be able to use this phone after Verizon takes over. Or whether I would stay with Verizon depending on their pricing policies for previous Tracfone customers. But it is still a great phone so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: I liked the operations and user friendly options, but when ordered, I ordered 2 on the same day, in the same order, and paid for both at the exact same moment. Only one shipped. These were ordered well in advance for gifts for my children, I only recieved one. When I called to ask about it, all I was told was item has not shipped. No kidding? I can see that for myself, my question is why can I not contact this particular seller, and why when my account was debited were my items not shipped.Do not recommend. I suggest another retailer. I would give zero stars if possible.
Excelente dispositivo buena pantalla y sonido para ver series, y pila excelente, solo se podrá usar en México como tablet pero está muy bien por el precio.

El terminar es de muy buena calidad, producto original como de alta embregadura. Sin embargo el almacenamiento interno es limitante a 32 GB, teniendo en cuenta su uso, para un cliente trabajador solamente nos otorga 12 GB libres sin complementar la expansión de los aplicativos instalados externamente. A lo cual si eres un cliente estudiante nos otorga 17 GB libres para un uso óptimo y de alto valor.
